Package org.forgerock.openam.upgrade

Class DirectoryContentUpgrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.upgrade.DirectoryContentUpgrader
  • public class DirectoryContentUpgrader
extends Object
    This class is aiming to upgrade the content of the configuration store. The possible changes may involve directory schema, modifying entries and in case of using embedded: creating and rebuilding indexes. The upgrade of an embedded instance is handled by OpenDJUpgrader separately from this upgrader. At the moment the following changes are made to the configuration store:
    • Adding the schema for CTSv2 if frCoreToken objectclass isn't already defined.
    • Creating the CTS containers in the directory if they don't already exist.
    • Creating the indexes for CTSv2 if embedded configstore is used.
    • Adding the schema for the dashboard service to the embedded user store.
    • Adding the schema for deviceprint module to the embedded user store.
    • Adding the UMA containers and UMA Labels schema if not present in versions less than 13.5.0.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DirectoryContentUpgrader​(String baseDir, String baseDN)
      This constructor will initialize the different directory content upgraders and ensures that each of them are actually applicable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryContentUpgrader

        public DirectoryContentUpgrader​(String baseDir,
                                String baseDN)
                         throws UpgradeException
        This constructor will initialize the different directory content upgraders and ensures that each of them are actually applicable. At the end this upgrader will have a list of Upgraders that needs to be executed.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - The base directory of OpenAM (where the configuration can be found).
        baseDN - The base DN of the configuration store.
        Throws:
        UpgradeException - If there was a problem while checking if a given Upgrader is applicable.

    • Method Detail

      • getLDIFPaths

        public List<String> getLDIFPaths()
        Returns the list of LDIF files that needs to be processed as part of the upgrade. Used when generating the upgrade reports.
        Returns:
        The path to the LDIF files that needs to be processed.

      • isApplicable

        public boolean isApplicable()
        Tells whether there is any LDIF file to process as part of the upgrade.
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one LDIF file to process as part of the upgrade.

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade​(boolean rebuildIndexes)
             throws UpgradeException
        Performs the upgrade by traversing through the candidate LDIF files and tries to process them. If embedded configuration store is used the indexes are also rebuilt as part of the upgrade. That will make sure that the newly created indexes are all operational.
        Throws:
        UpgradeException - If there was an error while processing the LDIF files.
